name: Xenos Chef
description:
------------------------- Xenos Chef -------------------------

A game about an interstellar chef looking for ingredients to cook in the universe to satisfy the needs of guests

------------------------- You play as an interstellar chef in the game. The goal of the game is to collect food from the blue planet, then process it on other planets, and finally submit the required food to the black hole within limited turns. -------------------------

Instruction

(Press 'H' for help in game)

Preparation Stage:

Drag all planets into the empty space, and press 'SPACE' when you are ready to start the game.

Cooking Stage:

Press 'WASD' to move between planets, and press 'SPACE' to interact with planets.

-------------------------

Created By:

Tiange Wan
